# `{bhamrc}`

## Installation

You can install the development version of `{bhamrc}` like so:

```{r}
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("Birmingham-River-Champions/bhamrc")
```

## Run

You can launch the application by running:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
bhamrc::run_app()
```
